body:
### Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.

We accept iterables but sometimes store the iterables which makes little sense for ones that can only iterate once.

### Describe the solution you'd like

Convert all iterables into lists eagerly when accepted.

comments.body: Rather, just accept `Sequence` instead of `Iterable` everywhere. This is what other Python libraries seem to do.

title: Ensure accepted iterables are iterated eagerly and stored as lists
